snippet.title: Journey to the Savage Planet Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
We are excited to announce that Journey to the Savage Planet is available TODAY on the Nintendo Switch eShop in Europe and the Americas, Russian digital release will be on May 28th. 

For those of you who like to own physical cartridges for your switch, the game will land in retail stores in Europe on June 25th and the Americas in the days after.

H2 Interactive will publish both digital and physical versions of Journey to the Savage Planet for Nintendo Switch in Korea, Hong Kong, and Japan at a later date.

We hope you enjoy your adventure on AR-y 26 on the Nintendo Switch!

For more information on the game, visit 
https://savageplanetgame.com
Facebook: https://facebook.com/playsavageplanet
Twitter: https://twitter.com/4thbestinspace
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playsavageplanet 
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/playsavageplanet/
Discord: https://discord.gg/typhoonstudios

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
